title: Cross-record field mapping
content:
In Service Management, there are several modules in which you can create a record based on an existing record. For example, you can create a change record or an incident record, based on an existing change. The following content details in each case which field values are copied from the existing record to the newly created one.

Related topics

  • Mapping records created from a change record
  • Mapping records created from an incident record
  • Mapping records created from a problem record
  • Mapping records created from a request record
  • Mapping records created from a service definition record
